Text: Anyone looking for a movie but don't really know what they want to watch should download this flick. It is absolutely entrancing despite it's rather dated and limited production values. This is one of those movies that despite the lack of fanfare, cannot be surpassed as far as it's subject matter. Probably the best love story ever caught on film.
